column9: Note to interviewer: Respondents who were classified as a "Smoker" or "Non Smoker" by answering the Tobacco - Smoking Status adolescent protocol, Question 1 as "Yes" (Have you ever smoked part or all of a cigarette?) are asked.
column17: 1 = More than 30 days ago but within the past 12 months
column18: 2 = More than 12 months ago but within the past 3 years
